snippet: Starting on Primary Day in September, the Campaign Finance Board will distribute thousands of “NYC Votes” stickers, and the board is asking the voters to create the design.
abstract: Trailside blog; New York CIty's Campaign Finance Board will distribute thousands of NYC Votes stickers to voters as they exit polls, starting on Primary Day in September; stickers are intended to allow New Yorkers who vote to boast about their contribution to the democratic process; board is asking public to help create the design.
lead_paragraph: Starting on Primary Day in September, the Campaign Finance Board will distribute thousands of “NYC Votes” stickers, and the board is asking the voters to create the design.

headline.main: Polling-Place Stickers Coming Up for Their Own Vote
headline.print_headline:
Stickers Coming Up
For Their Own Vote
